reactor.test

类 MemoryUtils.Tracked

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean
      • reactor.test.MemoryUtils.Tracked
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable
    封闭类:
    MemoryUtils

    public static final class MemoryUtils.Tracked
extends java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicBoolean
    An object emulating off-heap objects that need to be manually released. This is simply an AtomicBoolean that gets switched when released.

    Use safeRelease(Object) in generic object hooks to release a hook-provided object if it is an instance of MemoryUtils.Tracked.

    Note that AssertionsUtils.installAssertJTestRepresentation()'s AssertJ Representation recognizes this class.

    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      A pre-released MemoryUtils.Tracked instance for convenience in some tests.
